title: Homeopathic Allergy Medicines | Boiron USA
description: Stay strong against allergies all year long with non-drowsy relief for indoor, outdoor, and seasonal symptoms.
cleaned_text: Kids Pellets temporarily relieves these symptoms of hay fever or other upper respiratory allergies: itchy and watery eyes, sneezing, itchy throat and nose, runny nose, spasmodic cough associated with hay fever.
